name: STAR WARSâ„¢: Rebel Assault I + II
description: Installs the GOG version of Star Wars - Rebel Assault
notes:
If there is no sound, edit dosbox_rebel.conf. Change the following setting:
midiconfig=128:0

files.assets: N/A:Please provide an archive containing the Star Wars: Rebel Assault GOG installer

content:
files:
- assets: 'N/A:Please provide an archive containing the Star Wars: Rebel Assault GOG
    installer'
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/app/dosbox_rebel.conf
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/app/REBEL/REBEL.EXE
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: assets
